Virus Diseases/RNA Virus Infections/Hemorrhagic Fevers, Viral/Dengue/Dengue Hemorrhagic Fever

Findings_and_Disorders_Kind/Disease, Disorder or Finding/Disease or Disorder/Non-Neoplastic Disorder/Non-Neoplastic Disorder by Special Category/Infectious Disorder/Viral Infection/Dengue Fever/Dengue Hemorrhagic Fever
Record.Description: A distinct and virulent form of DENGUE characterized by thrombocytopenia and hemoconcentration (grades I and II) and distinguished by a positive tourniquet test. When accompanied by circulatory failure and shock (grades III and IV), it is called dengue shock syndrome. (From Dorland, 28th ed)
